div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 293 Delos, 1894 (304) Burial: c. 120 B.C. (T); c. 87 (Lewis) Contents: 30 AR. 3 hoards from separate houses in excavations Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Athens BCH 1895, pp. 462-3 Thompson, Athens, p. 519 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 283
